metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7664 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
In elfutils 0.175, a negative-sized memcpy is attempted in elf_cvt_note inlibelf/note_xlate.h because of an incorrect overflow check. Crafted elfinput causes a segmentation fault, leading to denial of service (programcrash).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7664` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

debuginfod - 0.176-1.1
elfutils - 0.176-1.1
libasm1 - 0.176-1.1
libdebuginfod-common - 0.176-1.1
libdebuginfod1 - 0.176-1.1
libdw1 - 0.176-1.1
libelf1 - 0.176-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.176-1.1').
